product-template-shineon-e-and-g-upsell.customizer_reviews_title: See what people are saying about us
product-template-shineon-e-and-g-upsell.description_delivery_details_html:
We've adjusted our estimates below based on the latest information from our carriers.

Once shipped, delivery within:

USA: 2-8 Business Days

Canada: 5-10 Business Days

Europe: 2-8 Business Days

International: 5-20 Business Days

All orders ship with Love from the USA
product-template-shineon-e-and-g-upsell.customizer_product_usps_translated_html:
• Unique, one-of-a-kind gift
  • NOT SOLD in stores
  • USA: 2-8 Business Days
product-template-shineon-e-and-g-upsell.customizer_badges_title: [reason_counter] great reasons to buy from us
product-template-shineon-e-and-g-upsell.customizer_content_below_upload_step_htm:
Description

Surprise someone you love with this unique and elegant jewelry item 🎁.

We say "UNIQUE" because each piece is different when you provide your photo.

This hand-crafted piece will never fade and is built to last!


Specifics

Made in Florida and Amsterdam
316 Steel or 18k Gold Finish
Adjustable Necklace Chain Measures 18"-22"
Water-Resistant


Delivery

Each piece is 100% custom hand-made to order in only 3-5 business days!
product-template-shineon-e-and-g-upsell.customizer_cart_addon_text:
Limited Time Offer

Buy now and get FREE GIFT BOX with each item.
product-template-shineon-e-and-g-upsell.review_sub_text: Loved by 1000s of people. Our one of a kind JewelCards are the perfect way to say how you really feel. Made of the highest quality materials throughout and shipped from the USA fast makes it the perfect gift experience.
product-template-shineon-e-and-g-upsell.lux_box_intro_text: Made in Traditional Mahogany Style. Soft Felt Lining. With A Built-In Spotlight To Show Off Your Perfect Gift
product-template-shineon-e-and-g-upsell.product_shineon_reviews_cro_design_1169_: 5@We received excellent quality@L North@We received excellent quality. Shipping and Customer Service was spot on! Will definitely order more soon!&5@Amazing product and excellent service@Z Sheppard@Amazing product and excellent service. I will again be placing an order in future for sure! It’s the best option if you want to make sure that it is certified and authentic!!!&5@Fast shipping@S Miah@Fast shipping. Great communication and got a little hook up! Def legit energy changing stone. I love mine&5@It was even more amazing than I thought…@R Nelson@It was even more amazing than I thought it was going to be. The shipping was real easy and I got a beautiful peice. I would definitely shop here again.
product-template-shineon-e-and-g-upsell.customizer_copy_delivery_details_metal_a:
We've adjusted our estimates below based on the latest information from our carriers.

USA: Orders typically ship 10-14 days from the order date but can be longer at times.

All orders ship with Love from the USA & Amsterdam
product-template-shineon-e-and-g-upsell.customizer_product_usps_metal_art_html:
• Unique, one-of-a-kind gift
  • NOT SOLD in stores
  • Personalized & Shipped from Florida and Amsterdam
